website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable, high quality ankle boot with a unique look that tends to run a bit large.
pros: Along with its stylish look and well-constructed design, this TOMS shoe is praised for fitting well, being easy to walk in, and being comfortable enough to wear all day
We also love that it is versatile enough to go with almost any outfit
cons: A few felt this shoe style runs large, and some felt arch support could be improved

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soft boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so soft and cute, but I was told they run small. Not true for me. The half size up were too large with socks and rubbed blisters. I’m returning for a smaller size. They are beautiful and I still give them a five star and am confident the stalker ones will work. The wool soles feel really good and do not fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. They fit well and they are VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. They fit well and they are VERY comfortable. I love higher heels, but as I get older it is harder and harder to wear high heels, so these were PERFECT! Low heel, stylish and comfy! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jewelry galore

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these boots. They are super cute but not as comfortable as I would hope. They are fairly loose around the ankle but tight around the toes. Without socks, I get blisters on my pinkie toes. I don't have wide feet. Not much arch support or cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes! In 3 colors
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! Purchased in 3 colors. Can wear them daily (teacher) durable for classroom to playground and pairs well with many outfits!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Tom’s quality is so dependable
customer_reviews.text: These booties are so cute and comfy! True to size and the color is well represented in the picture. I will definitely get the navy pair next.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S. Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes at first. I've worn them maybe 2 months & they definitely look worn out.
customer_reviews.author: carly huffman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots! Super cute, matches with everything and sooo comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: True to size and super comfortable. I will buy another pair in an ...
customer_reviews.text: True to size and super comfortable. I will buy another pair in an additional color I love these so much
customer_reviews.author: Marie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and were even cuter in person! Price was lower than everywhere else I looked.
customer_reviews.author: TechEditor

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and loose fit on my narrow feet, but if you wear the thicker boot socks not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: W. C. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: love, love
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pairs of deia boots....love, love, love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I get a lot of compliments and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Casondra Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots- super comfortable to walk around in all day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TOMS Deia Boot - Women's Toffee
product_meta.description: The Toms Deia Wool is a classic slip on with a suede upper, lace up closure, and rubber outsole,10010980,Created with a suede wedge and a rubber outsole,With every pair of shoes you purchase, Toms will give a new pair of shoes to a child in need,Black Friday and Cyber Monday 2017,,,Black Friday 2017
feature_bullets: The Toms Deia Wool is a classic slip on with a suede upper, lace up closure, and rubber outsole
Created with a suede wedge and a rubber outsole
With every pair of shoes you purchase, Toms will give a new pair of shoes to a child in need
